mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account AS "account", a.account_type AS "accountType", a.strategy_name AS "strategyName", a.evaluation AS "evaluation", a.score AS "score", a.run_time AS "runTimeD", a.backtrace_datestart AS "backtraceDateStart", a.backtrace_dateend AS "backtraceDateEnd", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_quant_strat_aval( id, account, account_type, strategy_name, evaluation, score, run_time, backtrace_datestart, backtrace_dateend, create_time, update_time, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strategyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runTimeD, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{backtraceDateStart, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backtraceDateEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_quant_strat_aval SET account = #{account}, account_type = #{accountType}, strategy_name = #{strategyName}, evaluation = #{evaluation}, score = #{score}, run_time = #{runTimeD}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
